mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASKET (USER_IDX, SNACK_IDX, QUANTITY) VALUES (#{userIdx},#{snackIdx},#{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_IDX, SNACK_IDX, QUANTITY FROM BASKET WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND SNACK_IDX = #{snackIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE BASKET SET QUANTITY = QUANTITY + #{quantity} WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND SNACK_IDX = #{snackIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT B.IDX, S.NAME, S.PRICE, B.QUANTITY, U.USERNAME FROM BASKET B LEFT JOIN SNACK S ON B.SNACK_IDX = S.IDX LEFT JOIN USER U ON B.USER_IDX = U.IDX WHERE B.USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
SELECT IDX, USER_IDX, SNACK_IDX, QUANTITY FROM BASKET WHERE IDX = ${idx}
